title: SB Xero Global OCR Reader
description: Reads a single Xero attachment (PDF) and its metadata, runs OCR / parsing, and returns structured data.

fileName.title: File name
fileName.description: Logical file name for this attachment (e.g. the Xero attachment file_name).

fileContentBase64.title: File content base64
fileContentBase64.description: Base64-encoded contents of the PDF file.

invoiceId.title: Invoice ID
invoiceId.description: Xero invoice ID this attachment belongs to (if available).

lineItemId.title: Line item ID
lineItemId.description: Xero line item ID this attachment is mapped to (if available).

masterAttachmentKey.title: Master attachment key
masterAttachmentKey.description: Global master attachment key used in the manifests.

pathLower.title: Path lower
pathLower.description: Dropbox path_lower value for this file, if applicable.

likelyTrackingHorse.title: Likely tracking horse
likelyTrackingHorse.description: Best-guess horse key / name this attachment is tracking (from the CSV).

xeroType.title: Xero type
xeroType.description: Type of Xero document (e.g. ACCREC, ACCPAY, etc.).

xeroYear.title: Xero year
xeroYear.description: Financial year this record belongs to (e.g. 2016, 2017â€¦).
